DescriptionData.Title: 321 Bee Body Balloons - Red (No Tip Color) (100/bag)
DescriptionData.Description:
Qualatex Red 3 inch x 21 inch Bee Body type balloons, without the black tips. The non-tipped Bee Body balloons offer versatility because they are all one color through the tip.
Use non-tipped 321 balloons to create apples, heads, ice cream cones, angels, ghosts, pumpkins, and lots of other things. Red Bee Body Balloons are perfect for making apples in spring or for back to school!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 100 per bag
3 inch x 21 inch Bee Body type balloons without the black tips
Comes in Red
Use non-tipped 321 balloons to create apples, heads, ice cream cones, angels, ghosts, pumpkins, and lots of other things

DescriptionData.Title: BeautySoClean Conditioning Brush Cleanser, 8.5 oz (250ml)
DescriptionData.Description:
BeautySoClean Brush Cleanser is specially designed with natural ingredients making it perfectly safe to use. Effectively cleans and sanitizes your face paint brushes. Works well for synthetic and natural bristles. Specially designed to dry fast. Leaves no residue on the brushes, face or makeup product.
Recommended for use in group painting events such as schools and other community events to prevent germs and infections from spreading from one face to another. All BeautySoClean products are Dermatology tested and non-irritating. 100% effective in 10 seconds. Comes in 8.5 ounce (250ml) bottle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Dermatologist Tested
Made with natural ingredients
Cleans effectively
Dries fast
8.5 ounce (250ml) bottle

DescriptionData.Title: Royal And Langnickel MODA Total Face Brush 7 pc Set - White
DescriptionData.Description: Royal And Langnickel MODA brush sets are stylish and beautiful brushes that cover all of your face makeup needs. They are designed with high quality material and are comfortable to use.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: MODA White Brush Set
Includes 6 brushes for a variety of makeup needs - powder brush, foundation brush, angle eye shadow brush, smoky eye brush, brow brush and lip brush
Portable, easy to carry, easy to access case
Stylish with matching handles, ferrules and color tipped bristles
High quality, hand made

DescriptionData.Title: BeautySoClean Cosmetic Sanitizer Wipes, 200 count
DescriptionData.Description:
BeautySoClean Cosmetic Sanitizer Wipes keep your makeup hygienic by preventing spreading of bacteria and germs.
BeautySoClean Cosmetic Sanitizer Wipes work exceptionally well to avoid bacteria growth in face paints, makeup pencils and liquid liners. Wipe after each use to help prevent infections. BeautySoClean Cosmetic Sanitizer Wipes work without drying out, cracking or altering the product's formula.
Recommended for use in group painting events such as schools and other community events to prevent germs and infections from spreading from one face to another. All BeautySoClean products are Dermatology tested and non-irritating. 100% effective in 10 seconds. Comes in 200 count package.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Perfect for sanitizing your everyday makeup
Ideal for everyday use
200 count
Dermatology tested and non-irritating
Recommended for use in group painting events such as schools and other community events to prevent germs and infections from spreading from one face to another

DescriptionData.Title: BeautySoClean Cosmetic Sanitizer Mist 8.5 oz (250 ml)
DescriptionData.Description:
BeautySoClean Sanitizer Mist effectively keeps your powder makeup germ-free and clean. Works well for blush powders, eye shadows, pressed powders, creme foundations and concealers. Specially formulated to not dry your makeup and help keep them fresh and safe to use. Sanitizes without cracking or changing the formula or color of the makeup.
Easy to use; cleans with just one mist. Comes in 8.5 oz (250 ml) size.
Recommended for use in group painting events such as schools and other community events to prevent germs and infections from spreading from one face to another. All BeautySoClean products are Dermatology tested and non-irritating. 100% effective in 10 seconds.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: BeautySoClean Sanitizer Mist effectively keeps your powder makeup germ-free and clean.
Easy to use
Cleans with just one mist
8.5 ounce (250 ml)
Dermatology tested and non-irritating

BeautySoClean Sanitizer Mist effectively keeps your powder makeup germ-free and clean. Works well for blush powders, eye shadows, pressed powders, creme foundations and concealers. Specially formulated to not dry your makeup and help keep them fresh and safe to use. Sanitizes without cracking or changing the formula or color of the makeup.
Easy to use; cleans with just one mist. Comes in 4.1 ounce (120 ml) size.
Recommended for use in group painting events such as schools and other community events to prevent germs and infections from spreading from one face to another. All BeautySoClean products are Dermatology tested and non-irritating. 100% effective in 10 seconds.

DescriptionData.Title: Glimmer Body Art Glitter Tattoo Skin Glue (10 ml)
DescriptionData.Description: Glimmer Body Art Glitter Glue is a cosmetic grade adhesive perfect for glitter tattoos. The Glitter glue is hypoallergenic, contains no latex and can last up to 7 days. This Glimmer Body Art Glitter Glue comes with a handy application brush inside the bottle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Cosmetic grade adhesive perfect for glitter tattoos
Glitter glue is hypoallergenic, contains no latex and can last up to 7 days
To remove from the skin: remove glimmer glue with alcohol or baby oil
Comes with a handy application brush inside the bottle
Comes in a 10ml bottle
